participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, enjoys music and driving.
participant_1.background: i listen to rap music. i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza. i produce music for artists.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves Disney and singing.
participant_2.background: i'm in the third grade. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground.

content.text: I am doing great. how are you?
